content.raw:
Notes on building FreeImage:

    # Get source from a fork of FreeImage modified to build on VS2013 Express.
    git clone https://github.com/vladkvit/FreeImage
    cd FreeImage
    msbuild FreeImage.2013.sln /p:Configuration=Release
    msbuild FreeImage.2013.sln /p:Configuration=Debug

Headers are in `FreeImage\Source` and libs are in `FreeImage\x64\[Debug|Release]`.
content.html:
Notes on building FreeImage:

# Get source from a fork of FreeImage modified to build on VS2013 Express.
git clone https://github.com/vladkvit/FreeImage
cd FreeImage
msbuild FreeImage.2013.sln /p:Configuration=Release
msbuild FreeImage.2013.sln /p:Configuration=Debug

Headers are in FreeImage\Source and libs are in FreeImage\x64\[Debug|Release].
